product.name: 크래프톤 배틀그라운드 대회 (PWS)
product.description: The official PUBG battle royale tournament for both professionals and amateurs to prove their skills.
product.key_benefit: Amateurs can participate and win with the right team roles and routine.

characters.name: 게이머
characters.appearance: Young Asian male, average build, expressive face. Short black hair, wearing a gaming headset on head.
characters.clothing: Black long-sleeve shirt, dark blue jeans. Casual gamer look.
characters.voice: Energetic and emotional, easily panicked but determined.

characters.name: GPT
characters.appearance: PUBG character with level 3 military helmet completely covering face. Tactical and robotic posture.
characters.clothing: White dress shirt, dark jeans, tactical belt with holstered pistol.
characters.voice: Calm, robotic, speaks in formal Korean ending with ~합니다.

scene_setting.location: Dark gaming room with glowing monitor, gaming chair, keyboard and mouse on desk.
scene_setting.lighting: Strong blue-white light from monitor only, creating silhouette effect on character.

camera_setup.texture: realistic skin texture, glowing monitor light

mood_style.color_tone: Dark room with intense blue-white monitor glow

audio.background: Silent tension building to digital surge
audio.fx: Digital whoosh, electrical crackling, vortex sound

A.action: Sitting in gaming chair, typing on keyboard, staring at monitor intently.
Suddenly pulled forward by invisible force. Arms reach out desperately. Body stretches unnaturally toward the glowing screen as he gets sucked into the digital world.

scene_setting.location: Post-apocalyptic urban street. Abandoned concrete buildings, broken windows, debris on streets, overcast sky.
scene_setting.lighting: Overcast daylight, grey sky, diffused shadows.

camera_setup.texture: gritty urban decay, realistic character detail

mood_style.genre: Chaotic comedy in survival game world

A.action: Standing in middle of street, spinning around frantically, looking at surroundings in disbelief.
A.dialogue: 으아 아니 진짜 게임속으로 들어가면 어떻게 하냐고!

B.action: Standing calmly to the left of A, gestures with one hand while explaining.

scene_setting.location: Urban combat area with concrete barriers, damaged walls for cover positions.
scene_setting.lighting: Daylight with slightly dramatic shadows from buildings.

audio.fx: gunfire, reload sounds, footsteps, shell casings

A.action: Behind cover, pops up, aims rifle at targets. Fires controlled bursts. Moves tactically to next cover.
A.dialogue: 맨날 벽만 쏘다가, 진짜 실전 같이 쏘니까 실력이 느는 것 같은데?

B.action: Standing nearby, watching and nodding approvingly.

A.action: Movements become more fluid and skilled. Takes down multiple targets with precision.

scene_setting.location: Open street with long sightlines, exposed position with no nearby cover.

mood_style.color_tone: High contrast, harsh whites and deep shadows

audio.fx: sniper shot crack, bullet whiz, impact sound

timeline.camera: [Quick cuts: Wide to CU on A]

A.action: Standing in open. Suddenly flinches as bullet hits nearby. Dives to the ground in panic, scrambling for any cover.

scene_setting.location: Behind concrete barrier, tense atmosphere with distant threat.
scene_setting.lighting: Dramatic shadows from barrier, high contrast.

mood_style.color_tone: Moody shadows with highlights on face

A.action: Crouched behind concrete barrier, breathing heavily. Peeks out cautiously to assess the threat. His expression shifts from fear to determination as he makes a decision.
